txt.en: [placeholder], make haste, as we do not have any time to squander. Skirmish Camps may be found in all regions of Middle-earth, from Ered-Luin to Moria. Travel quickly to the closest Skirmish Camp to you and report in. More instructions will follow.\n\nIdhrinnion

'Idhrinnion alerted me that we might have someone of your stature reporting in to camp today, but I did not initially believe him. I am glad to be proven wrong, [placeholder]. \n\n'Let us not waste time on pleasantries or trivialities, though. There is much to do.'

'Good! You have come. There is trouble brewing, and we will have need of all the help we can garner, [placeholder]. \n\n'Let us not waste time on pleasantries or trivialities, though. There is much to do.'
War is coming to Middle-earth. You have been asked to report to one of the newly-established Skirmish Camps to help stem the tide.
Talk to a Skirmish Captain within a Skirmish Camp

Skirmish camps are at Bree's South-gate, Thorin's Hall, Esteldín, Nimrodel, the Twenty-first Hall, Ost Guruth, Rivendell, Brockenborings, Tinnudír, Sûri Kylä, Aughaire, and Gwingris. \n\nYou have been instructed to report to the Captain of a Skirmish Camp. Skirmish Camps may be found within every region of Middle-earth.
